basics.name: Phil Bell
basics.label: Senior Software Developer
basics.summary: As a Senior Software Engineer, I am proficient in **Python**, specifically within **Django, FastAPI and Flask** frameworks, along with expertise in **Rust** and **Go**. My skill set is further complemented by comprehensive DevOps experience, particularly in **Docker** and CI/CD pipelines. Currently, I'm driving innovation in the Legaltech and Fintech sectors, leveraging my prior experience in the Communications industry. My foundation in these complex technical arenas is rooted in a solid Computer Science degree..

work.name: Legl
work.summary: Legl, a fintech firm operating in the legal industry, offers innovative solutions in compliance, finance, and fundraising. My journey started when the company was still CrowdJustice, as a Software Engineer, contributing to Legl's evolving product suite. In 2021, I specialized as a Backend Engineer and, following my dedicated work, earned a promotion to Senior Backend Engineer in July 2022.
highlights: Making imrpovments to our CI/CD with CircleCI and Github Actions
Managing Heroku and AWS infrastructure with Terraform

work.name: CityFibre
work.summary: A leading UK-based Fiber Infrastructure ISP focused on FTTP networks, I led the development of microservices for internal and external tools, enhancing our digital operations. Additionally, I managed our expansive IoT device mesh, ensuring the seamless operation of our fiber network and reinforcing our reputation for reliability and performance.
highlights: Working on low level IOT devices
Creating and managing the provisioning systems
